Title: Authorizes boards of elections to establish a method of collection of absentee ballots utilizing county, town, city and village clerks
Summary: Authorizes boards of elections to establish a method of collection of absentee ballots utilizing county, town, city and village clerks.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the election law, in relation to authorizing boards of elections to establish a method of collection of absentee ballots utilizing county, town, city and village clerks
